aircraft.description: Baseline VWV MiG-17F SFM; variants are multiplicative perturbations around this.

scaling_model.cx0: Multiply all Cx0 values in SFM_Data.aerodynamics.table_data by this factor.
scaling_model.polar: Multiply all B2 and B4 values in SFM_Data.aerodynamics.table_data by this factor.
scaling_model.pfor: Multiply all Pfor values in SFM_Data.engine.table_data by this factor.

variants.notes: Direct copy of current SFM; used as control.
